## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution in detail. Include:

- API changes (if any)
- Breaking changes (if any)
- Configuration options
- Examples of how it would be used

## Alternatives Considered

What alternatives did you consider? Why aren't they sufficient?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or examples of the feature in action.

## Priority

- [ ] Critical (blocking issue)
- [ ] High (important for next release)
- [ ] Medium (nice to have)
- [ ] Low (backlog)

## Implementation Notes

Any notes about implementation approach, constraints, or considerations.
